content: row 11 and 12 row 19-48 repeat row 3-18 snow cool page 2 of 3 finishing fold ear warmer in half with right sides touching fold each end see photo tuck in ends so that you have 4 layers see bottom photo chain 1 slip_stitch across all 4 layers cut yarn turn right side out weave in all loose ends and block gently if necessary note if you prefer you can sew across all 4 layers instead pattern created by sonja m otto © 2024 snow cool page 3 of 3
